content.original: This warhead replaces the normal explosive charge of the standard short-range missile with a small tank of a gelled Acid, weakening a Targets resistance. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: This warhead replaces the normal explosive charge of the standard short-range missile with a small tank of a gelled Acid, weakening a Targets resistance. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 这种弹头使用小型凝胶酸罐取代了标准近程导弹的普通炸药,弱化目标的防御.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: This warhead replaces the normal explosive charge of the standard short-range missile with a small tank of a gelled Acid, weakening a Targets resistance. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 这种弹头使用小型凝胶酸罐取代了标准近程导弹的普通炸药,弱化目标的防御.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Counter Missile Systems are build upon the same principle as an AMS, utilizing a smart warhead that gets into the path of a incoming salvo and detonate there. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Counter Missile Systems are build upon the same principle as an AMS, utilizing a smart warhead that gets into the path of a incoming salvo and detonate there. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 对抗导弹系统建立在与AMS相同的原理上,利用智能弹头射入到来袭武器的路径上并在那里引爆.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Artemis IV SRM's have a ''smart'' Warhead that is able to efficiently guide itself towards any target, specifically designed to be used with and requiring the Artemis System offer these Missiles unparalleled Accuracy .
content.prevOriginal: Artemis IV SRM's have a ''smart'' Warhead that is able to efficiently guide itself towards any target, specifically designed to be used with and requiring the Artemis System offer these Missiles unparalleled Accuracy .
content.content: 月神IV型SRM有一个'智能'弹头,能够有效地引导自己指向任何目标,专门设计用于月神系统,需要月神系统为这些导弹提供无与伦比的精度.

content.original: Artemis IV SRM's have a ''smart'' Warhead that is able to efficiently guide itself towards any target, specifically designed to be used with and requiring the Artemis System offer these Missiles unparalleled Accuracy .
content.prevOriginal: Artemis IV SRM's have a ''smart'' Warhead that is able to efficiently guide itself towards any target, specifically designed to be used with and requiring the Artemis System offer these Missiles unparalleled Accuracy .
content.content: 月神IV型SRM有一个'智能'弹头,能够有效地引导自己指向任何目标,专门设计用于月神系统,需要月神系统为这些导弹提供无与伦比的精度.

content.original: Deadfire Rockets are standard Short Range Missile bodies equipped with an upgraded high explosive payload. In order to make room for this additional payload, severe cuts were taken to the weapons onboard guidance system, all but removing it. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Deadfire Rockets are standard Short Range Missile bodies equipped with an upgraded high explosive payload. In order to make room for this additional payload, severe cuts were taken to the weapons onboard guidance system, all but removing it. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 亡焰火箭是标准的短程导弹弹体,配备了升级的高爆战斗部.为了给这一额外的战斗部腾出空间,对机载武器制导系统进行了严重的削减,几乎将其移除.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Deadfire Rockets are standard Short Range Missile bodies equipped with an upgraded high explosive payload. In order to make room for this additional payload, severe cuts were taken to the weapons onboard guidance system, all but removing it. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 亡焰火箭是标准的短程导弹弹体,配备了升级的高爆战斗部.为了给这一额外的战斗部腾出空间,对机载武器制导系统进行了严重的削减,几乎将其移除.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Doubled Ammo Bins replace one ammo bins feeding and storing mechanism to 25% more shots into one location. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Doubled Ammo Bins replace one ammo bins feeding and storing mechanism to 25% more shots into one location. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 双倍弹药舱:将一个弹舱的进料和储存机制替换为一置多25%子弹的弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Infernos are special fuel-air missile munitions that are a development of the incendiary weapons of the mid-twentieth century. They combine flammable chemicals with an adhesive compound to shower their targets with a burning gel. This gel is designed to increase a 'Mech's heat levels to the point where the DI computer shuts down the 'Mech's Fusion Engine. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Infernos are special fuel-air missile munitions that are a development of the incendiary weapons of the mid-twentieth century. They combine flammable chemicals with an adhesive compound to shower their targets with a burning gel. This gel is designed to increase a 'Mech's heat levels to the point where the DI computer shuts down the 'Mech's Fusion Engine. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 炼狱是一种特殊的燃料空气导弹弹药,是20世界中叶的燃烧武器的进一步发展.他们将易燃化合物和粘着剂混合,用燃烧的凝胶喷洒向目标.这种凝胶的设计目的是将机甲的热量水平提高到DI电脑关闭聚变引擎的程度.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

They combine flammable chemicals with an adhesive compound to shower their targets with a burning gel. This gel is designed to increase a 'Mech's heat levels to the point where the DI computer shuts down the 'Mech's Fusion Engine. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Listen-Kill (aka L-K) missile technology is an upgrade to missiles to improve their accuracy. This is achieved through a small computer and homing device in the missile's head that allows it to home in on the electronic noise of a BattleMech or tank. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Listen-Kill (aka L-K) missile technology is an upgrade to missiles to improve their accuracy. This is achieved through a small computer and homing device in the missile's head that allows it to home in on the electronic noise of a BattleMech or tank. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 听-杀(又名L-K)导弹技术是对导弹的升级,以提高其准确性.这是通过一个小型电脑和导弹头部的瞄准装置来实现的,该装置允许导弹跟踪战斗机甲或坦克的电子噪声.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Originally conceived as an electronics countermeasure attack against a targeted BattleMech's targeting and tracking systems, its designers quickly discovered that the prototype Magnetic Pulse Warhead also had the unintended side-effect of momentarily weakening the magnetic shielding of Fusion Engines, triggering a notable 'heat spike' before the engine's containment returned to normal.. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Originally conceived as an electronics countermeasure attack against a targeted BattleMech's targeting and tracking systems, its designers quickly discovered that the prototype Magnetic Pulse Warhead also had the unintended side-effect of momentarily weakening the magnetic shielding of Fusion Engines, triggering a notable 'heat spike' before the engine's containment returned to normal.. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 最初被认为是针对目标战斗机甲的瞄准和跟踪系统的电子对抗攻击,其设计者很快发现,原型磁脉冲弹头有一个意想不到的副作用,即瞬间削弱聚变发动机的磁屏蔽,在发动机的安全壳恢复正常之前触发一个明显的'热尖峰'.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Originally conceived as an electronics countermeasure attack against a targeted BattleMech's targeting and tracking systems, its designers quickly discovered that the prototype Magnetic Pulse Warhead also had the unintended side-effect of momentarily weakening the magnetic shielding of Fusion Engines, triggering a notable 'heat spike' before the engine's containment returned to normal.. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 最初被认为是针对目标战斗机甲的瞄准和跟踪系统的电子对抗攻击,其设计者很快发现,原型磁脉冲弹头有一个意想不到的副作用,即瞬间削弱聚变发动机的磁屏蔽,在发动机的安全壳恢复正常之前触发一个明显的'热尖峰'.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: C.A.S.E. ammunition bins are designed with blast plates facing away from vital components on a mech. Once sensors have detected an ammunition explosion the plate nearest to the outside is jettisoned. Resulting in much of the explosive potential to expand towards the free space outside and away from the mech. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: C.A.S.E. ammunition bins are designed with blast plates facing away from vital components on a mech. Once sensors have detected an ammunition explosion the plate nearest to the outside is jettisoned. Resulting in much of the explosive potential to expand towards the free space outside and away from the mech. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: C.A.S.E.弹药舱的设计有爆炸面板以保护机甲上的重要部件.一旦传感器检测到弹药爆炸,靠近最外面的面板就被抛掉.将大量的爆炸能量导向机甲外部空间.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Designed to replace standard SRMs with special warheads that penetrate armor and inflict damage to the internal structure of the target, the Tandem-Charge Missile uses a pair of explosives to inflict damage. The first explosive is a shaped charge that penetrates the unit's outer armor, while the second charge is propelled through the newly created breach to damage internal components. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Designed to replace standard SRMs with special warheads that penetrate armor and inflict damage to the internal structure of the target, the Tandem-Charge Missile uses a pair of explosives to inflict damage. The first explosive is a shaped charge that penetrates the unit's outer armor, while the second charge is propelled through the newly created breach to damage internal components. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 聚能导弹旨在用特殊弹头取代标准SRM战斗部,这种弹头能够穿透装甲并对目标的内部结构造成伤害,天腾式导弹使用一对炸药造成伤害.第一种炸药是一种能穿透单位外装甲的聚能装药,而第二种炸药则通过新形成的缺口来破坏内部部件.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
